name: newsblur-archive-extension
description: NewsBlur Archive Browser Extension - Automatically archive your browsing history

scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && npm run copy:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && npm run copy:firefox
scripts.copy:chrome: mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp manifest.json dist/chrome/ && cp -r src icons _locales dist/chrome/
scripts.copy:firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cp -r src icons _locales dist/firefox/
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox

author: Samuel Clay
